meta.description: "Together At Home" was touted as a virtual concert organized by Lady Gaga. But it was much more than that. It was about countless celebrities repeating specific messages while promoting specific elite organizations. Here's a look at the true message of "Together At Home".

title: "Together At Home" Was An Infomercial for the Global Elite and its Agenda
cleaned_text: Together At Home was more than a "virtual concert". It was a show of force. It was broadcast everywhere, on all TV stations and on all streaming platforms. That fact alone was a strong indication of the sheer power behind this event. Furthermore, the
